## Book App
<img height="200px" alt="book-app-screenshot" src="https://github.com/Reikasan/Reikasan/assets/68085523/67c0d2dc-9de2-4477-9529-e75fb0d8ecb0">

This app is created for personal use. Users can save book information, along with memos, by utilizing the Google Books API.

GitHub: https://github.com/Reikasan/Book-app

### Built with 
- Laravel
- React
- Material UI
- TypeScript
- MySQL
- Google Books API
